content: crochet flower airtag case by viktoriya this is a simple beginner-friendly crochet pattern user should know how to chain single_crochet double_crochet and make a magic_ring pattern materials repeat step 1 and 2 twice to make two flowers yarn 100% cotton yarn 4 1 center of flower brown medium size in 3 colors i suggest peaches & creme make a magic_ring or lily sugar n cream yarn single_crochet x 10 into magic_ring 4 mm crochet hook slip_stitch into first single_crochet chain cut off yarn pull yarn tight to close magic_ring and embroidery needle secure with a knot scissors stitch markers optional 2 petals yellow abbreviations us terms optional insert a stitch marker into every other single_crochet since it will be difficult magic_ring magic_ring to see upcoming stitches after chain chain making each petal single_crochet single_crochet insert hook into a single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet into double_crochet double_crochet first stitch double_crochet x 5 into the next slip_stitch slip_stitch stitch x 5 st/s stich/es slip_stitch into first single_crochet chain cut off yarn … repeat the instructions in leave a long tail for one of the brackets flowers 3 stem green average time 30 minutes make a slip knot chain x 28 finished size cut off yarn and pull it through the last chain 2 1 in diameter stiching flowers together put the flowers back sides together sew in edges with long tail using embroidery needle you can sew this any way i sewed using outside loops of each side sew together following the image where marked green stoping before the last petal if available insert your airtag to make sure it will fit connecting the stem insert one of the stem tails into the embroidery needle insert stem as shown into image following the arrows as steps tie the two tails together with a double or tripple knot and cut off access yarn looping case to keychain ring if you d like to attach this to your keychain ring loop the stem around ring and pull fllower through the stem loop finished product
